citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:10 pm on 29-SEP-
2021.
Spoke to employees (non-authorized) and left business card with them, asking for them to relay that I needed a call.
On 10/1/2021, I phoned the direct number for a listed authorized person; she told me she is no longer involved with the
business.
The main business line is 100% automated with no ability to leave a message.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:10 pm on 29-SEP-
2021. 
 
Spoke to employees (non-authorized) and left business card with them, asking for them to relay that I needed a call. 
On 10/1/2021, I phoned the direct number for a listed authorized person; she told me she is no longer involved with the 
business. 
The main business line is 100% automated with no ability to leave a message. 
 
 
 
End Section
